Methods

addAnimation(element, attribute, events, duration, parameters)

Add an animation to an existing element..work in progress / used in some old projects

Parameters:
Name Type Description
element HTMLElement | string

object or id of object to find in DOM
attribute string | object

or object with custom parameters
events array
duration number
parameters object
Source:
  • methods/addAnimation.js, line 28
Returns:

HTMLElement

Example
CM.addAnimation(document.querySelector('rect'),{
    events:[
        [0,   'white'],
        [0.1, 'gray'],
        [1,   'white']
    ],
    duration:0.75,
    custom:{
        id:'testAni'
    }
})

create(type, obj) → {object}

Create an HTML element

Parameters:
Name Type Description
type string
obj object
Source:
  • methods/create.js, line 21
Returns:

html object

Type
object
Example
let newElement = cm.create('p', {
   innerHTML:'hello world',
   style:{
     'font-size':'16px';
     }
   } 
);
display.appendChild(newElement)
